alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:16PM CDT until July 13 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 715 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles southwest of Merritt Reservoir, or 29 miles north of Mullen, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Merritt Reservoir, Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River, Speckel Meir Lake, Steer Creek Campground, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area and Sevenmile Hill. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 92 and 101, and between mile markers 105 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
